    • Method Detail

      • purchasePhone

        public void purchasePhone(java.lang.String phoneModel,
                 java.lang.String accountName)
        Creates a new mobile phone for a student.
        Parameters:
        phoneModel - the name of the phone.
        accountName - the name of the provider.

      • topUp

        public void topUp(int pounds)
        Verifies if there is a mobile phone. If it is a mobile phone it increases it`s account by the given argument.
        Parameters:
        pounds - the number of pounds to top up the account.

      • makeCall

        public void makeCall(int desiredSeconds)
        Verifies if there is a mobile phone. If it is a mobile phone this method will calculate the Balance of the Account, then will calculate the seconds talked on that phone.
        Parameters:
        desiredSeconds - seconds on the phone.

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Provides a Student(name, phone(model, seconds, account(provider, balance))) repesentation.
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        the Student representation under a string format.
